page.title: 19LOCAL NEWS AND SPORT
page.content: { CRICKET MATCH-GOYTRE V USK {(Junior Schools)} On Friday 28th June 1985,Goytre Primary School visited the new school in Usk for a cricket match.The team of 12 boys travelled, by mini-bus,with Mr.J.Eynon their teacher.At 1.30pm Goytre began their innings.They batted very well and scored 62 runs,Mark Baxter making 35 n.o.Usk also played very well and were eventually all out for 32 runs.Then Goytre,the winners, joined the Usk boys for some refreshments in the new school. BRITAIN'S TOP CYCLISTS COMPETE Next Sunday ,30th June,in Abergavenny the most spectacular cycle-racing event ever seen in Gwent takes place. Three road races will take place and nearly all Britain's professional riders will take part.A five hour feast of top class racing is promised.
